title: on me by section 11(1) of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961) (as adapted
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Use of Powered
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Use of Powered 

Personal Transporters) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 20 May 2024. 

Definitions
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited road traffic (use powered personal transporters) regulation 2024 (2) regulation come operation 20 may 2024 definition

title: on me by section 11(1) of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961) (as adapted
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“electric scooter” has the meaning assigned to it in the Electric Scooters 
Regulations; 

“Electric Scooters Regulations” means the Road Traffic (Electric Scooters) 
Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 199 of 2024). 

Prohibition of use of powered personal transporters
text_norm: 2 regulations-- electric scooter meaning assigned electric scooter regulation electric scooter regulation mean road traffic (electric scooters) regulation 2024 (s.i no 199 2024) prohibition use powered personal transporter

title: on me by section 11(1) of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961) (as adapted
heading: 3. The use of a powered personal transporter (other than an electric scooter
text_raw:
3. The use of a powered personal transporter (other than an electric scooter 
used in accordance with the Electric Scooters Regulations) in a public place is 
prohibited. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 May, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [224] 3
text_norm: 3 use powered personal transporter (other electric scooter used accordance electric scooter regulations) public place prohibited given official seal 16 may 2024 eamon ryan minister transport notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 17th may 2024 224 3

title: on me by section 11(1) of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961) (as adapted
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prohibit the use of powered personal transporters (other than 
electric scooters which comply with the Road Traffic (Electric Scooters) 
Regulations 2024 (S.I. 199 of 2024)) in public places.
